des: "These slushy margaritas are made in the freezer. No blending required! But they must be made ahead to allow time to freeze."
ins: Mix the water, tequila, limeade, and orange liqueur in a freezer-proof container with a lid; stir. Cover and store in freezer until it reaches a slush-like consistency, about 24 hours. Serve in glasses garnished with lime wedges.
